text: I saw several men running down towards the shack. They were all armed with rifles. As the nearest of them came round the shack, his rifle at the ready, I saw it was Nick Dowd, still wearing his blue check shirt. He came up close, eyeing us suspiciously. "We've come 2a-calling," I said. "Can't see no reason for calling," he said. "Still long as you're here you may as well stay a while.

As the nearest of them came round the shack, his rifle at the ready, I saw it was Nick Dowd, still wearing his blue check shirt. He came up close, eyeing us suspiciously. "We've come 2a-calling," I said. "Can't see no reason for calling," he said. "Still long as you're here you may as well stay a while.
